meanings.definition: The act of sailing or traveling around something, especially the world.
meanings.sent1: Many explorers attempted daring circumnavigations of the globe.
meanings.sent2: Ferdinand Magellan's circumnavigations of the Earth were groundbreaking.
meanings.sent3: The pirate captain boasted about his numerous successful circumnavigations of the seven seas.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams took her on mental circumnavigations of distant lands.
meanings.sent5: The history book vividly described the first recorded circumnavigations of the planet.

meanings.definition: The completion of a journey around something, especially the world.
meanings.sent1: The circumnavigations of ancient mariners were filled with dangers.
meanings.sent2: The astronauts' circumnavigations of the moon were celebrated as a triumph.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful circumnavigations of the yard always amused the children.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts took him on mental circumnavigations of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The film depicted the thrilling circumnavigations of a fictional explorer.
